casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert A.D. WALDRUP 189P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Robert A.D. Waldrup, for Waldrup, Robert A.D. Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of June 2017 by Defendant for Trial Transcript be Used as an Exhibit:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
